changeProposal.label: Change Proposal's type?
changeProposal.content1: You are about to change the type of your proposal.
changeProposal.content2: Some data specific to the proposal type may be lost.

clearBtn.label: Clear
clearBtn.toolTip: This will clear the file upload selection

deleteTarget.label: Delete this target ?
deleteTarget.content1: NOTE : Selections to the observations will also be removed

deleteObservation.label: Delete this observation ?
deleteObservation.content1: NOTE : Selections to the targets will also be removed

listOfTargets.label: List of Targets
listOfTargets.toolTip: A list of target will be entered and/or imported from file

pageStatus.toolTip: This is the status of the page

proposals.empty: THERE ARE NO PROPOSALS TO BE DISPLAYED

members.label: Members
members.empty: THERE ARE NO TEAM MEMBERS ASSOCIATED WITH THIS PROPOSAL

noSpecificTarget.label: No specific Target
noSpecificTarget.toolTip: Current functionality is not yet available

specialCharacters.invalid: Invalid input: only alphanumeric characters, spaces, and some special characters are allowed
specialCharacters.email: Please enter a valid email address.

targetObservation.label: Target List related to the selected Observation

targetMosaic.label: Target Mosaic
targetMosaic.toolTip: Current functionality is not yet available

targets.label: Targets
targets.empty: THERE ARE NO TARGETS ASSOCIATED WITH THIS PROPOSAL

help.proposalType1: Below are the available Proposal Types that can be used as a basis for a new proposal.
help.proposalType2: A description of the different types is provided as an aid as to the correct type to be selected to allow the proposal to be completed as required
help.proposalType3: It is possible to be able to change this at a later date, however be aware that this may cause information already entered to be lost
help.title: This title should be used to allow for the identification of this proposal in a list of proposals

0.title: Title
0.desc: TITLE. In this space should be some sort of description as to the purpose of this page, including guidance, how to progress, etc
